card_text: If this card is Special Summoned: You can add 1 "Lyrilusc" Spell/Trap from your Deck to your hand. If this card is in your GY: You can target 1 "Lyrilusc" Xyz Monster you control; attach this card to it as material. You can only use each effect of "Lyrilusc - Celestine Wagtail" once per turn.
